name: Sudden Oak Death - Phytophthora ramorum
description: Bark canker hosts (e.g. oaks) will have black or reddish ooze bleeding from cankers.  Foliar hosts (e.g. Rhododendron) will have leaf spots.
appearance: Camellia- Leaf lesions at leaf tip or margin with diffuse margins.
Pieris- Necrotic leaf spots and shoot dieback
damage: Pest Alert: Sudden oak death update (8/2007)
